group.Description: classification of participant based on study desease status

genetic_id.Description: Uniq sample ID per genotyped sample in genetic database

BatchID.Description: SNP array genotyping uniq batch ID per group of subjects

VariationSetType.Description: Availability of SNV and/or CNV information

Assembly.Description: Reference genome from which the sample variations were computed

Levels.hg19: Human genome version 19 equivalent to GRCh37 (Genome Reference consorcium of human build 37)
Levels.hg38: Human genome version 38 equivalent to GRCh38 (Genome Reference consorcium of human build 38)
Levels.hg19/hg38: Genome used to compute respectively the variations

GeneticDataType.Description: Raw genetic data type submited for the dataset

Levels.WES: Whole Exome Sequencing data (compressed FastQ or binary data format such as BAM or CRAM )
Levels.SNP_intensity: SNP array intensity data (text formated data type known as Illumina Final Report data)
Levels.WES/SNP_intensity: Both WES or SNP array data are available
